statements: SELECT * FROM Agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM Agents WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, callback_time FROM CallbackRequests WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, callback_time FROM CallbackRequests ORDER BY callback_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Agents WHERE status='active' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT agent_id, COUNT(callback_id) FROM CallbackRequests GROUP BY agent_id HAVING COUNT(callback_id) > 5 ORDER BY COUNT(callback_id) DESC;
SELECT customer_name, callback_time FROM CallbackRequests WHERE callback_time > '2022-01-01' AND status='pending' ORDER BY callback_time ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(callback_id) AS total_callbacks FROM CallbackRequests INNER JOIN Agents ON CallbackRequests.agent_id = Agents.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name ORDER BY total_callbacks DESC;
SELECT AVG(callback_duration) AS avg_duration, MAX(callback_duration) AS max_duration, MIN(callback_duration) AS min_duration FROM CallbackRequests;
SELECT * FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Agents WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT request_id, customer_name, priority FROM CallbackRequests ORDER BY priority;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM CallbackRequests GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT customer_name, requested_at FROM CallbackRequests WHERE requested_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY requested_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Agents ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM Agents WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM CallbackRequests WHERE priority = 'High' AND requested_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY requested_at ASC;
SELECT agent_id, name, phone_number, COUNT(agent_id) AS total_requests FROM Agents INNER JOIN CallbackRequests ON Agents.agent_id = CallbackRequests.agent_id GROUP BY agent_id;

SELECT agent_id, name, email, COUNT(agent_id) AS total_requests FROM Agents LEFT JOIN CallbackRequests ON Agents.agent_id = CallbackRequests.agent_id GROUP BY agent_id HAVING total_requests >= 5 ORDER BY total_requests DESC;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone_number FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_name, status FROM customers JOIN callback_requests ON customers.customer_id = callback_requests.customer_id WHERE callback_requests.priority = 1 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM callback_requests WHERE status = 'Pending' AND priority > 1 ORDER BY request_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM agents JOIN customers ON agents.agent_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Agents
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM CallbackRequests WHERE request_priority > 3
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM Agents JOIN ScheduledCallbacks ON Agents.agent_id = ScheduledCallbacks.agent_id
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT request_date, request_priority FROM CallbackRequests WHERE request_priority > 2 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS scheduled_callbacks_count FROM ScheduledCallbacks GROUP BY agent_id HAVING COUNT(schedule_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Agents JOIN ScheduledCallbacks ON Agents.agent_id = ScheduledCallbacks.agent_id WHERE ScheduledCallbacks.schedule_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY agent_name ASC, schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(request_id) AS num_requests FROM CallbackRequests GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_requests > 3;
SELECT agent_id, callback_time FROM Callbacks WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY callback_time ASC;
SELECT agent_id, start_time, end_time FROM AgentAvailability WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT request_id, agent_id, request_time FROM CallbackRequests WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY request_time DESC;
SELECT callback_id, agent_id, callback_time, status FROM Callbacks WHERE status = 'Completed';
